20 #include "conveyor_interface/conveyor_interface_core.hpp"
21 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
22 #include <memory>
23 #include <ros/ros.h>
24 #include <ros/service_client.h>
25 
26 #include <string>
27 
28 static std::unique_ptr<ros::NodeHandle> nh;
29 
30 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, setConveyor)
31 {
32  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
33 
34  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
35  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
36 
37  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
38  srv.request.id = 6;
39  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::ADD;
40  client.call(srv);
41 
42  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
43  EXPECT_NE(srv.response.id, srv.request.id);
44 }
45

47 /******** Test case when we have 2 convoyers ***/

79 
80 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, controlConveyor1)
81 {
82  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
83 
84  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
85  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
86 
87  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
88  srv.request.id = 12;
89  srv.request.control_on = true;
90  srv.request.speed = 75;
91  srv.request.direction = 1;
92  client.call(srv);
93 
94  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
95 }
96 
97 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, controlConveyor2)
98 {
99  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
100 
101  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
102  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
103 
104  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
105  srv.request.id = 12;
106  srv.request.control_on = true;
107  srv.request.speed = 75;
108  srv.request.direction = -1;
109  client.call(srv);
110 
111  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
112 }
113 
114 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, controlConveyor3)
115 {
116  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
117 
118  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
119  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
120 
121  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
122  srv.request.id = 12;
123  srv.request.control_on = false;
124  srv.request.speed = 75;
125  srv.request.direction = -1;
126  client.call(srv);
127 
128  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
129 }
130 
131 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, controlConveyorWrongId)
132 {
133  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/control_conveyor");
134 
135  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
136  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
137 
138  conveyor_interface::ControlConveyor srv;
139  srv.request.id = 7;
140  srv.request.control_on = true;
141  srv.request.speed = 75;
142  srv.request.direction = -1;
143  client.call(srv);
144 
145  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::CONVEYOR_ID_INVALID);
146 }
147 
148 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, removeConveyor)
149 {
150  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
151 
152  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
153  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
154 
155  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
156  srv.request.id = 12;
157  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::REMOVE;
158  client.call(srv);
159 
160  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::SUCCESS);
161 }
162 
163 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, duplicatteRemovingConveyor)
164 {
165  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
166 
167  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
168  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
169 
170  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
171  srv.request.id = 12;
172  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::REMOVE;
173  client.call(srv);
174 
175  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_FOUND);
176 }
177 
178 TEST(TESTSuiteNedAndOne, RemoveConveyorWrongId)
179 {
180  auto client = nh->serviceClient<conveyor_interface::SetConveyor>("/niryo_robot/conveyor/ping_and_set_conveyor");
181 
182  bool exists(client.waitForExistence(ros::Duration(1)));
183  EXPECT_TRUE(exists);
184 
185  conveyor_interface::SetConveyor srv;
186  srv.request.id = 7; // to be checked
187  srv.request.cmd = conveyor_interface::SetConveyor::Request::REMOVE;
188  client.call(srv);
189 
190  EXPECT_EQ(srv.response.status, niryo_robot_msgs::CommandStatus::NO_CONVEYOR_FOUND);
191 }
192 
193 int main(int argc, char **argv)
194 {
195  ros::init(argc, argv, "conveyor_interface_service_client");
196 
197  nh = std::make_unique<ros::NodeHandle>();
198 
199  testing::InitGoogleTest(&argc, argv);
200 
201  return RUN_ALL_TESTS();
202 }
